page.title: 08Employment Survey
page.content: We carried out a small employment survey of the pupils leaving our school. The results indicated that 36% of families in our area were affected by unemployment.Generally,there are less people working.Many local factories have closed down or are due to close down and some of our friends have moved away. Question:"What's it like being a child of an unemployed person ?" Some of the answers : John said "Sometimes it's quite good,I am always near my dad ". Helen replied "He is always there when I come home from school ". Finally, Maria said "In a way I'm disappointed because I don't get much pocket money and my dad feels a bit depressed because he hasn't got much money either and he would like a job ".
